stimulusHtml: In Kollwitz’s Memorial Sheet for Karl Liebknecht, the artist references which of the following traditions to help communicate her message?
choicesHtml: Byzantine secular mosaics, such as the Justinian and Theodora panels in San Vitale
Dutch seventeenth-century prints, such as Rembrandt’s Self-Portrait with Saskia
Medieval narrative textile embroideries, such as the Bayeux Tapestry
Specific image types of Christian sacred art, such as Giotto’s Lamentation
